EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Richard, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, July 10, 2012 5:47 PM To: 'rwloth@aol.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Richard , Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Phillip Wylie. Philliphas enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaUZVulN%2By%2F2WLufukDiqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to see if it is something that you might find valuable.
